snippet: Lawrence Timmons intercepted a pass by Kansas City’s Matt Cassel and returned the ball to the 5 early in overtime to set up Pittsburgh’s game-winning field goal.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Pittsburgh Steelers defeat Kansas City Chiefs, 16-13, in overtime; Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger leaves game in third quarter with shoulder injury; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Timmons intercepted a pass by Kansas City’s Matt Cassel and returned the ball to the 5 early in overtime to set up Pittsburgh’s game-winning field goal.

headline.seo: Steelers Beat Chiefs in Overtime, but Lose Roethlisberger
headline.main: Steelers Beat the Chiefs in Overtime After Losing Roethlisberger
headline.print_headline: Steelers Beat the Chiefs in Overtime After Losing Roethlisberger
